title: Accumulate Experience by Reading Books - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Books   Bookworm   Cheats   Chefs   Cooking   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Weak to Strong   Writers

description: Protagonist Lee Jong-suk is a book lover. One day he visits the usual second hand bookstore, and purchases a hardcover book. He later on discovers that the book lets him write his own experiences and exchange it for something he needs!>
